verses.text: Mamin Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil, yelxo val te nib'ab'il a cajnub'.
Manh jantacoc snib'ej in k'ol tzin aj t'a yamaq'uil a cajnub' chi'. Ach Dios pitzan, tzin b'itan t'ayach t'a tzalajk'olal t'a smasanil in k'ool.
Ha nok' tz'unun yet' nok' sanhcapech, tz'ilchaj b'aj tz'aj nok', sb'oan so' nok' b'aj tz'aj yune' t'a slak'anil altar, ach Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil, in Reyal ach, in Diosal ach.
Wach' yic eb' cajanek' t'a a cajnub'. Max yactejlaj eb' sb'itan t'ayach.
Te wach' yic eb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool, aton eb' snib'ej spet javi sk'ual q'uinh, yic sb'at eb' t'a a cajnub' t'a tzalan Sion.
Ayic tzek' eb' t'a lum ch'olan b'aj sq'uib' te' bálsamo, icha sjaj ha' cotac melem tz'ajkan jun ch'olan chi'. Axo b'ab'el nhab' tz'ak'an yaxb'oc lum ch'olan chi'.
Tz'ochnhej stek'anil eb' sik'lab'il, haxo t'a Sion tzach yil eb' ach in Diosal Axonhej Ochi.
Mamin Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil, ach sDiosal winhaj Jacob, ab' co lesal tik.
Ach Dios, ilcot winh co reyal tzonh tanhvani, aton winh a sik'naquelta. Ak' a wach'k'olal t'a yib'anh winh.

Yelxo val te wach' tzin aj junok k'ual t'a slak'anil a cajnub', t'a yichanh pax mil k'ual najat ay in eli. In gana to tzin aj in tanhvej spuertail a cajnub' chi' t'a yichanh to tzin aj t'a spat eb' sk'ulan chukal.

Ach Jehová co Diosal, a ach tzak' sakil k'inal t'ayonh, tzonh a tanhvani. Tzak' a wach'k'olal t'a yib'anh eb' sb'eyb'alan tojolal, tzik'anchaanh eb'. Tzak'nhej masanil tastac wach' t'a eb' yujto ay elk'och t'a sat eb'.
Mamin Jehová, Yajal ach t'a Smasanil, te wach' yic eb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool.
